Package game_world.api

Interface FacadeGameWorld

public interface FacadeGameWorld
The Facade for the GameWorld.
Version:
3.0
Author:
Andreas Awouters Thomas Van Erum Dirk Vanbeveren Geert Wesemael

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addListener​(GameWorldListener listener)
    Add a listener to the gameWorld
    void drawGameWorld​(java.awt.Graphics g, int width, int height)
    Draw the gameWorld onto a Graphics object.
    PredicateResult evaluatePredicate​(Predicate predicate)
    Evaluate a predicate in the gameWorld.
    ActionResult executeAction​(Action action)
    Execute an action in the gameWorld.
    java.util.List<Action> getAllActions()
    List of all valid actions.
    java.util.List<Predicate> getAllPRedicates()
    List of all valid predicates.
    boolean goalReached()
    Check if the goal is reached.
    void loadSnapshot​(Snapshot snapshot)
    Load the game state from the snapshot with given snapshotID.
    void makeNewGameWorld()
    Initialize a new GameWorld.
    Snapshot makeSnapshot()
    Make a snapshot of the current gameWorld state
    static FacadeGameWorld newInstance​(java.lang.Class<?> implClass)
    Return a new instance of a FacadeGameWorld Implementation using a given Implementation class.
    void removeListener​(GameWorldListener listener)
    Remove a listener from the gameWorld
    void resetGameWorld()
    Reset the gameWorld.

  • Method Details

    • makeNewGameWorld

      void makeNewGameWorld()
      Initialize a new GameWorld.

    • getAllActions

      java.util.List<Action> getAllActions()
      List of all valid actions.
      Returns:
      a list of Strings with all valid action names

    • getAllPRedicates

      java.util.List<Predicate> getAllPRedicates()
      List of all valid predicates.
      Returns:
      a list of Strings with all valid predicate names

    • executeAction

      ActionResult executeAction​(Action action)
      Execute an action in the gameWorld.
      Parameters:
      action - | name of the action to be executed
      Returns:
      ActionResult depending on the result of the action | Success : Action executed successfully | Illegal : Action is illegal in the current game state | GoalReached : Action resulted in the reaching of the goal | UnknownAction : Action is not known in the current gameWorld system

    • evaluatePredicate

      PredicateResult evaluatePredicate​(Predicate predicate)
      Evaluate a predicate in the gameWorld.
      Parameters:
      predicate - | name of the predicate to be evaluated
      Returns:
      PredicateResult depending on the evaluation of the predicate | True : Result of evaluation is true | False : Result of evaluation is false | BadPredicate : Predicate is not known in the current gameWorld system

    • goalReached

      boolean goalReached()
      Check if the goal is reached.
      Returns:
      true if the goal is reached in the current game state

    • drawGameWorld

      void drawGameWorld​(java.awt.Graphics g, int width, int height)
      Draw the gameWorld onto a Graphics object.
      Parameters:
      g - | Graphics object to draw the gameWorld on
      width - | allowed width of the drawing
      height - | allowed height of the drawing

    • resetGameWorld

      void resetGameWorld()
      Reset the gameWorld.

    • makeSnapshot

      Snapshot makeSnapshot()
      Make a snapshot of the current gameWorld state
      Returns:
      ID of the taken snapshot

    • loadSnapshot

      void loadSnapshot​(Snapshot snapshot)
      Load the game state from the snapshot with given snapshotID.
      Parameters:
      snapshotID - | ID of snapshot to load

    • newInstance

      static FacadeGameWorld newInstance​(java.lang.Class<?> implClass) throws java.lang.InstantiationException, java.lang.IllegalAccessException
      Return a new instance of a FacadeGameWorld Implementation using a given Implementation class.
      Parameters:
      implClass - Class of the Game World implementation.
      Returns:
      a new instance of FacadeGameWorld
      Throws:
      java.lang.InstantiationException
      java.lang.IllegalAccessException

    • addListener

      void addListener​(GameWorldListener listener)
      Add a listener to the gameWorld
      Parameters:
      listener - Listener to add

    • removeListener

      void removeListener​(GameWorldListener listener)
      Remove a listener from the gameWorld
      Parameters:
      listener - Listener to remove
